data.name: Beautiful Light
data.detailed_description:
Beautiful Light is a Hardcore multi-players first-person shooter where four squad of four operators should enter, secure and extract an artefact,
You will also face Anomaly also controlled by players on huge and higly detailled map.

The gameplay focus atmosphere, tactique, and teamplay.




Beautiful Light is made by a two developper, with love, who play hardcore FPS every day.
We are attached to little details who make everything, and we are close to our community and feedback, don't hesitate to join us on discord !


Features :



  • 16 Players : 4 Squad of 4 Operator
  • Self player hosting or dedicaced server hosted and customised by the community
  • Monsters
  • Deep and Hardcore FPS mechanic
  • Huge focus on Immersion (Breath sound, realistic footstep, Heartbeat, Realistic Gaz Mask...)
  • Minimalistic HUD : Well, there is no HUD.
  • Advanced Inventory System
  • Oppressive atmosphere
  • Tacticool stuff : Laser, Breach Charge, Tactical Light, Night-Vision...
  • Little Price : Because our passion is to share game before everything.
  • Huge and detailed Maps*
  • We take care of fluidity and bugs : of course, bugs will be here but it's a huge concerne for us to solved them, and be able to run the game with a good framerate.

* One map for EA, after the EA, we plan to add more maps, and probably new (and totally different) game mode.
